articles.content: The market has given more than 50 percent return in last one year and has climbed several milestones. Recently, the BSE Sensex scaled above 61,000 and Nifty50 above 18,300 mark for the first time on … [+8817 chars]

articles.title: Crypto Exchange WazirX Locked Around 14,500 Accounts During April-September - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange WazirX said that it has locked around 14,500 user accounts during April 1 to September 30, 2021 along with a 100% compliance rate for law enforcement requests.
articles.content:
Currently, WazirX said it has a total user base of 8.5 million.
